TopicTitle: Suggestion for New updates for the game and forum

Articles.Content:
For the game : Add Indonesian Language .why? most of my friend cannot speak english and they want to play

For the forum:Add Indonesian in international Section.

Well, I personally learned English mostly from games and movies. It's a good place to start

About the forum section, they could probably create one if there was enough demand. Is there?

Well, I personally learned English mostly from games and movies. It's a good place to start

About the forum section, they could probably create one if there was enough demand. Is there?
